text: 5:28 Matyu 27:25; Aposel 2:23; 2:36; 4:18; 7:52Ezɨ ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “E akar gavgavim ia ganɨga ghaze, ia Iesusɨn ziamɨn gumazamizibar sure damuan markɨ! Ezɨ ia orazir puvatɨgha men sure gamima ian suren mɨgɨrɨgɨaba Jerusalem bar a garui. Egha ia ghaze, e Iesus mɨsoghezɨ an areme.”
